title: Carfentanil
summary: Carfentanil or carfentanyl, sold under the brand name Wildnil, is an opioid analgesic which is used in veterinary medicine to anesthetize large animals such as elephants and bears.[1] It is typically administered in this context by tranquilizer dart.[1] Carfentanil has also been used in humans for imaging of opioid receptors.[1] It has additionally been encountered as an illicit drug, typically used by injection, insufflation, or inhalation.[1] Deaths have been reported in association with carfentanil.[1][2]
